data.title: Royal Cosun
data.meta_description: Royal Cosun is an agro-industrial cooperative. Our ambition is to optimally use the vegetable raw materials. Good for the environment, financial return and it responds to the social need for responsible products and processes. We manufacture ingredients for food, non-food applications and the chemical industry.
data.text:
Royal Cosun is an agri-industrial group firmly rooted in the primary sector. The businesses that are part of the Cosun family are Aviko, Duynie, Sensus, Suiker Unie and SVZ.

Within Cosun we are able to share and apply our knowledge and experience. Together with the business groups, our Cosun R&D, Cosun Innovation and Cosun Biobased Products are looking for new, smart applications of biomass, contributing to making Cosun companies more sustainable with a focus on the circularity of agriculture Ã¡nd our processes.
